name: .MIX File Extension
summary: Learn about .MIX files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: A MIX file is a game data file used by the Command & Conquer (C&C) real-time strategy games. It may contain game scenarios, movies, music, and sounds. Examples of MIX files installed with C&C games include conquer.mix, local.mix, movies.mix, and music.mix.

content: Games that use MIX data files include:
Newer C&C games developed by Electronic Arts (and not Westwood Studios) store game data in .BIG files.

instructions: You can open, edit, and manage Command & Conquer MIX files using XCC Utilities (Windows), which is a group of player-created utilities that allows Command & Conquer enthusiasts to play MIX audio and videos, open and edit MIX maps, and create their own MIX files.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
